front.title: Service Affinity Solution for TCP based Application in Anycast Situation

abstract.t: This draft proposes a service affinity solution between client and server based on the newly defined TCP Option. This solution can avoid the waste of resources caused by saving a large amount of customer status data in the network equipment, and realize the optimized scheduling of resources based on network conditions and computing power resources in the distributed computing power network scenario, so as to realize the reasonable operation of cloud network resources.
